thread.title: BRIEF-Fedex Confirms That A Package Detonated At A San Antonio Ground Facility Early Today

title: BRIEF-Fedex Confirms That A Package Detonated At A San Antonio Ground Facility Early Today

organizations.name: san antonio ground facility early today reuters

text: March 20, 2018 / 5:59 PM / Updated 30 minutes ago BRIEF-Fedex Confirms That A Package Detonated At A San Antonio Ground Facility Early Today Reuters Staff March 20 (Reuters) - Fedex Corp: * FEDEX RESPONDS TO INCIDENTS IN TEXAS * HAVE ALSO CONFIRMED THAT THE INDIVIDUAL RESPONSIBLE ALSO SHIPPED A SECOND PACKAGE THAT HAS NOW BEEN SECURED AND TURNED OVER TO LAW ENFORCEMENT * CONFIRMED THAT A PACKAGE DETONATED AT A SAN ANTONIO FEDEX GROUND FACILITY EARLY THIS MORNING‍​ * THERE WERE NO SERIOUS INJURIES FROM THIS CRIMINAL ACTIVITY * PROVIDED LAW ENFORCEMENT RESPONSIBLE FOR THIS INVESTIGATION EXTENSIVE EVIDENCE RELATED TO THESE PACKAGES Source text : bit.ly/2IDlL4f Further company coverage:
